description: The Lily of the Incas (Alstroemeria 'Glory of the Andes') is an amazing and unique flower. With vibrant and intricate petals, it’s a favourit among flower lovers. Its long-lasting blooms in shades of pink, yellow, orange, red and white can spread cheer wherever they’re placed. It also makes an ideal cut-flower as it holds its beauty longer than most. Its strong stems and vibrant flowers make it a perfect choice for outdoor landscaping and garden beds. Its delicate perfume is a great addition to many gardens and adds a pleasing scent to outdoor areas. This unique flower is sure to bring any outdoor space to life with its beauty and brightness.
